de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<V extends SpatialComparable>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<V>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSpatialDistanceFunction, AbstractSpatialNorm, ArcCosineDistanceFunction, BrayCurtisDistanceFunction, CanberraDistanceFunction, ChiSquaredDistanceFunction, ClarkDistanceFunction, CosineDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingLatLngDistanceFunction, EuclideanDistanceFunction, HistogramIntersectionDistanceFunction, HistogramMatchDistanceFunction, JeffreyDivergenceDistanceFunction, JensenShannonDivergenceDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1DistanceFunction, LatLngDistanceFunction, LngLatDistanceFunction, LorentzianDistanceFunction, LPIntegerNormDistanceFunction, LPNormDistanceFunction, ManhattanDistanceFunction, MaximumDistanceFunction, MinimumDistanceFunction, OnedimensionalDistanceFunction, SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceLPNormDistanceFunction, SubspaceManhattanDistanceFunction, SubspaceMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedCanberraDistanceFunction, WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction, WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction

    public interface SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<V extends SpatialComparable>
extends PrimitiveDistanceFunction<V>
    API for a spatial primitive distance function.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
